mapper.select: select * from book_info order by bi_seq desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into book_info (bi_name, bi_sub, bi_cop, bi_cate, bi_status, bi_stock, bi_pub_dt, bi_writer, bi_point) values(#{bi_name}, #{bi_sub}, #{bi_cop}, #{bi_cate}, #{bi_status}, #{bi_stock}, #{bi_pub_dt}, #{bi_writer}, #{bi_point})
